entry.tran: 有事业心的;有创新精神的;有胆识的
entry.def: An enterprising person is willing to try out new, unusual ways of doing or achieving something.

example.ex: Debra is a very enterprising young black businesswoman who is involved in a lot of activities...
example.tran: 德布拉是个年青而又非常有胆识的黑人女商人，其涉猎广泛。

example.ex: Some enterprising members found ways of reducing their expenses or raising their incomes.
example.tran: 一些有创新精神的成员找到各种增收减支的方法。

means.word_mean: 1. marked by imagination, initiative, and readiness to undertake new projects;

sentences.sentence: "an enterprising young man likely to go far"

means.word_mean: 2. marked by aggressive ambition and energy and initiative;

sentences.sentence: "a pushing youth intent on getting on in the world"

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有进取心的,有事业心的
stems_affixes.word_buile: enterprise事业心,进取心+ing……的→adj.有进取心的,有事业心的
surprise诧异,惊异+ing状态→adj.令人惊讶的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 事业,企[事]业单位;事业心,进取心
stems_affixes.word_buile: enter进入+prise拿住,抓住→进入抓住[目标]→把某一事业掌握一定范围→企业;事业
sur在……上面+prise拿住,抓住→在上面突然被抓住→吃惊
ap加强动作+prise拿住,抓住→抓住信息

stems_affixes.value_cn: 包含,包括,由……组成;构成,组成
stems_affixes.word_buile: com全部+prise拿住,抓住→全部抓住→包括
sur在……上面+prise拿住,抓住→在上面突然被抓住→吃惊
